author: Moe Isaza
description: Moe Isaza says of his drink, "This cocktail is inspired by home, family and whatever the future may hold. Poderoso is the Spanish word for mighty and powerful; its definition is 'having an abundance of ability.' One succeeds by facing any challenge with the spirit of not giving up."The name is inspired by my brother, Will, as he is also in the hospitality industry and has surpassed my wildest dreams. He is the living example of my legacy."
name: Poderoso

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle lemon wedge in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
